mapper.insert: insert into t_reports(commodityId, user_id, reason) values (#{commodityId}, #{userId}, #{reason})
mapper.select: select tr.reportId, tr.commodityId, tr.user_id tr_uid, tc.user_id tc_uid, tr.reason, tc.message, tr.create_time from t_reports as tr left join t_commodity as tc on tr.commodityId = tc.commodityId where audit_state = 0 order by reportId desc
